# My Blog

This is my personal blog, on which I talk about subjects that are of interest to me (and potentially, to you as well). It's based on Next.js and uses the Sanity headless CMS.

___

## Features
* Light and dark mode support
* Posts, categories, tags
* Post sharing links
* Custom pages
* Contact form
* Fully responsive layout based around Tailwind/Tailwind Variants
* Automatically generated RSS/Atom feeds
* Automatically generated sitemap
* Browser and RSS feed reader support on the RSS page

___

## Found an issue? Have a suggestion?
If you've found a bug or you have a suggestion, please reach out to me either here on GitHub or using the [contact form](https://www.andrew-c.me/contact-me) on my website.
